brainly_data.question: How did LBJ focus on the Civil Rights agenda during 1960’s?
brainly_data.subject: History

all_answers.question: How did LBJ focus on the Civil Rights agenda during 1960’s?
all_answers.subject: History
all_answers.text: LBJ focused on the Civil Rights agenda during the 1960s by using his Great Society Program which it's goal was to end racial injustice and poverty. :)
